categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Tailor" was the alias of a member of the Krath cult active on Empress Teta during the Galactic Civil War. Shortly after the Clone Wars, Tailor orchestrated the deaths of the patriarch of the Sekko family and his wife, orphaning their daughter. Using the girl's uncle to bring her into the fold of the Krath, Tailor acted as the handler of Sianna Sekko and groomed her into a powerful young witch. It was speculated that he had ties to the Galactic Empire and promoted anti-Jedi sentiment.
